name: Road to cactus from another asset pack
name_original: Road to cactus from another asset pack
description:
Made for #KenneyJam2021, all assets by Kenney.nl

Controls: left mouse click on roads.

There is a tutorial, but here are some tips:

Press on road and you can remove the rock from it (for a price).

When the rock is removed, you can rotate the road.

Connect buildings to castle using roads to activate them. Rocks can only be removed if there is a road leading up to them.
